title: Offline installer for bash
body: It needs to be possible to install bash offline.

comments.body: yes, and add to this all the problems with Windows App Store download...

Links/instructions that can be used for offline installations:
https://msdn.microsoft.com/commandline/wsl/install-on-server#enable-the-windows-subsystem-for-linux

Not sure where to post this but we just found out that you can't capture/restore a Windows 10 .wim image if Bash is installed. The restore bombs with "Access Denied". Our plan was to build a reference PC with Bash installed and use it to image target computers but apparently dism.exe doesn't like Bash for some reason. Where should we post this for assistance? Thanks.
There are great security reasons for this, (like secure development environments).

If you got stuck with the downloading problem, you can try my project on GitHub which is able to install BashOnWindows in an offline environment.
https://github.com/DDoSolitary/LxRunOffline
